.. _`Pariwise scatterplot`:

PARIWISE SCATTERPLOT
====================

Perform pairwise scatterplot on sample counts





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_pariwise_scatterplot:
        input:
            counts = "table.tsv"
        output:
            png = "plot.png"
        message:
            "Testing Pairwise_scatterplot wrapper"
        threads:
            1
        resources:
            mem_mb = (
                lambda wildcards, attempt: min(attempt * 512, 1024)
            ),
            time_min = (
                lambda wildcards, attempt: min(attempt * 10, 20)
            )
        log:
            "logs/test_pariwise_scatterplot.log"
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-240-gd9cffe8c/bio/seaborn/pairwise-scatterplot"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris



Code
----
